title: Decent Bronze sup/adc/jug LF duo partner
body:
Play around Silver level, stuck in Bronze. Have an adc friend I play with, hit B3, then fall back down due to him being on at irregular times. I'm always playing, especially next few weeks. Don't rage, learn from mistakes ^_^

add: nubcone

replies.body: Hey man I am a silver 5 who mains support/mid would love to play a bit of duo action.
